mapper.select: select grp_cd grpCd, cd, cd_nm cdNm, use_yn useYn, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd = #{code}
select grp_cd grpCd, cd, cd_nm cdNm, use_yn useYn, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd = 'T001' AND CD LIKE CONCAT(#{deptCd}, '%')
